Bloggers Spelling Suggestion of Technorati

Paul Kinlan
  • Blog
  • Archives
I was spell checking my last entry, and Blogger's spelling suggestion for Technorati was Degenerate.

It made me chuckle.

Bloggers spell checker is so poor, it doesn't recognise Blog [or British English Spelling]. At least it keeps me on my toes.
